DOC.brief_summary: This study open-label , parallel-group comparison Mometasone Furoate Dry Powder Inhaler ( MF-DPI ) 200 mcg daily even two puff vs. Budesonide Dry Powder Inhaler ( BUD-DPI ) 200 mcg twice daily two puff time patient previously treat inhaled corticosteroid ( ICS ) without ICS diagnose mild persistent moderate persistent asthma ( classified Global Initiative For Asthma , 2005 ) previous 4 week . The primary efficacy endpoint percent change baseline FEV1 .
